fees.additionalInfo: We generally charge 3% of any cash advance from your credit card account, subject to a minimum of $4 if the cash advance is made outside Australia. The amount on which the fee is charged may include fees and other charges related to the cash advance transaction. For ANZ Rewards Travel Adventures cards, we won’t charge a Cash Advance Fee on cash withdrawals made outside Australia. See your letter of offer for details (including how we calculate the fee and when it applies).

discounts.additionalInfo: This applies to all onsale consumer cards products.
discounts.description: No Late Payment Fee will apply if you hold an ANZ Access Basic Account.

You will not be charged an Overlimit Fee where ANZ provides you with an Informal Overlimit amount during the Statement Period and: - you hold an ANZ Access Basic Account; or - we determine that: (1) Your account was opened before 18 June 2012 and you have asked us to decline transactions (in most cases) that will take you over the credit limit; or (2) Your account was opened on or after 18 June 2012 and at the time the Informal Overlimit amount is provided you have not consented, or you have withdrawn your consent to being charged an Overlimit Fee (unless you are charged an Overlimit Fee in accordance with paragraph A in respect of an earlier Informal Overlimit amount).

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rates are subject to change. The interest rate that applies to cash advances is currently equivalent to the interest rate that applies to standard balance transfers.
